bill.title: Gaming; courses related to service industry may be taught at certain state universities and colleges.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 75-76-34, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Certain Courses Related To Employment In The Gaming Industry May Be Offered At State Institutions Of Higher Learning And Public Community And Junior Colleges, Only In Those Counties Where Gaming Is Legally Being Conducted And The Particular Institution Or College Offering Such Courses Is Located Or Has A Branch; To Provide That State Institutions Of Higher Learning And Public Community And Junior Colleges Offering Such Courses Shall Not Be Subject To Regulation By The Mississippi Gaming Commission; To Amend Sections 75-76-55, 37-101-13, 37-29-1 And 37-29-63, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.
